cause.description:
we are a small group that is tired of desicions being made based purely on their agendas and what their party wants. the point of the government is to provide what is best for the people, not their own wallets
1. Right/Wrong should be the only bias
2. votes and descisions should not be for monetary gains
3. bicameral legilature is only a name, not a standard
cause.mission: convice politicians that biased decisions are wrong decisions
cause.name: politics shouldnt be about biases
